item.title: Jasprit Bumrah achieves historic ICC Rankings feat, equals all time Indian record - The Times of India
item.description:
Jasprit Bumrah Achieves Historic ICC Rankings Feat, Matches All-Time Indian Record

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

Jasprit Bumrah, India’s leading fast bowler, has reached an impressive milestone in the ICC Men's Test Bowling Rankings with 904 rating points, equaling the highest rating ever achieved by an Indian bowler.

  • Bumrah's performance in Brisbane contributed to his elevation in the rankings, as he took 9 wickets for 94 runs, earning 14 rating points.
  • The record previously held by Ravichandran Ashwin has now been matched, and Bumrah has a chance to surpass it in the upcoming Melbourne Test.
  • Travis Head has moved closer to the top three in the ICC Men's Test Batting Rankings following recent outstanding performances.
  • Notable changes in men's rankings have occurred stemming from various matches across formats.
  • Other players like Kagiso Rabada, Josh Hazlewood, and Pat Cummins have also seen significant movements in their rankings.
“Jasprit Bumrah's outstanding performance has solidified his top position in the Test Bowling Rankings.”

The ongoing Test series is witnessing remarkable individual performances, significantly influencing player rankings across international cricket.

item.title: Stock picks for 2025: Rudra Murthy recommends these top 10 stocks to buy; 3 sectors he is bullish on | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
Stock picks for 2025: Rudra Murthy recommends these top 10 stocks to buy; 3 sectors he is bullish on

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Live Mint

CA Rudra Murthy B.V. advises investors to focus on value rather than momentum in 2025, emphasizing large-cap stocks amidst a challenging market for Indian stocks.

  • The benchmark indices Nifty 50 and Sensex are down nearly 9-10% from their all-time highs.
  • Murthy suggests that investors should be cautious and seek out undervalued stocks.
  • He expresses confidence in specific sectors for growth opportunities.
“Investors will be better off chasing value rather than momentum in 2025.”

Overall, Murthy's insights provide a roadmap for navigating the upcoming market uncertainties by seeking value-driven investment opportunities.

item.title: 'Delayed projects by 35-40 years': PM Modi's sharp attack on Congress - The Times of India
item.description:
Delayed projects by 35-40 years: PM Modi's sharp attack on Congress

Publication Date: [Insert Date]
Source: [Insert Source]

In a recent address, Prime Minister Modi sharply criticized the Congress party, accusing them of causing significant delays in infrastructure projects over the last several decades.

  • PM Modi claimed that Congress's inefficiency has led to delays of 35-40 years in various critical projects.
  • He emphasized the importance of timely completion of projects for national development.
  • The speech was a part of a larger campaign to highlight the government's achievements and contrast them with the previous administration's performance.
“The negligence of Congress has cost our nation dearly, and we must rectify these delays.”

PM Modi's remarks come as part of a broader effort to rally support ahead of upcoming elections, highlighting contrasting political legacies.

item.title: By 2030, 60% of new home buyers will be Millennials and Gen Z in India: JLL Report | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
By 2030, 60% of New Home Buyers in India Will Be Millennials and Gen Z: JLL Report

Publication Date: December 25, 2023 | Source: ANI

The JLL report anticipates that Millennials and Gen Z will make up 60% of new home buyers in India by 2030, driven by urbanization, technological innovation, and changing consumer preferences.

  • Millennials are defined as those born from the early 1980s to the early 2000s, while Gen Z covers individuals born from the mid-1990s to the early 2010s.
  • The urban homeownership rate is projected to increase from 65% in 2020 to 72% by 2025.
  • Tier II and III cities are emerging as key growth areas, responsible for over 40% of new housing development by 2025.
  • The housing sector is expected to contribute 13% to India’s national GDP by 2025.
  • Sustainability will play a crucial role, with green-certified buildings expected to double in proportion to new projects by 2025.
  • The market for smart homes and tech-integrated living spaces is rapidly expanding.
  • Residential sales are expected to see a 17% increase in 2024 compared to 2023, with total sales doubling.
"Sustainability, which was once considered a luxury, is now a necessity in the housing market."

In conclusion, the trends indicate a significant shift in the Indian housing market, with Millennials and Gen Z expected to drive demand and influence future developments.

item.title: Market outlook 2025: Nifty 50 could correct another 5-10% in the first half, says Murthy of Vachana Investments | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
Market outlook 2025: Nifty 50 could correct another 5-10% in the first half, says Murthy of Vachana Investments

Published on: December 2023
Source: Mint

Investors may face disappointment in the Indian stock market as a significant recovery is not expected until the latter half of 2025, following a forecasted decline in the Nifty 50 index.

  • Market veteran Rudra Murthy predicts a further drop of 5-10% in the Nifty during the first half of 2025.
  • Concerns over disappointing earnings, high valuations, and geopolitical issues are contributing to market corrections.
  • The Nifty 50 is projected to end the year with a low double-digit gain despite recent downturns.
  • Murthy suggests that recovery in the index may depend on upcoming Budget announcements and improvements in earnings.
  • Sectors such as pharmaceuticals and banking may offer better prospects amidst the current market challenges.
"We might see some more weakness in the Indian stock market... Recovery will start only from July onwards." - CA Rudra Murthy B.V.

In conclusion, while the outlook for the Indian stock market appears challenging in the near term, specific sectors may present investment opportunities moving forward.

item.title: Your Christmas just got hotter: 5 raunchy Christmas movies to stream this holiday season! - Hindustan Times
item.description:
5 Raunchy Christmas Movies to Stream This Holiday Season

Date: Dec 25, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

This holiday season, spice up your movie-watching experience with five raunchy Christmas films that add a deliciously naughty twist to the festivities.

  • Hot Frosty: A lonely widow brings a handsome snowman to life, leading to unexpected romance.
  • The Merry Gentlemen: A big-city dancer aims to save her family’s theatre with a shirtless, Christmas-themed revue.
  • Our Little Secret: A woman navigates family drama when she encounters her ex during Christmas.
  • ‘Twas the Text Before Christmas: A spontaneous trip leads to unexpected friendships and a potential romance.
  • A Paris Christmas Waltz: An accountant and retired dancer find chemistry while competing in a Christmas dance competition.
“Grab your cosy blanket, a box of chocolates, and settle in for a Christmas binge.”

These films promise to bring excitement and laughter to your holiday celebrations, making for a memorable and entertaining viewing experience.

item.title: Alternative investment funds: Dispelling myths and unlocking potential | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Alternative Investment Funds: Dispelling Myths and Unlocking Potential

Publication Date: September 2023 Source: Mint

Alternative Investment Funds (AIFs) in India have crossed ₹5 trillion in funds raised, with investment commitments nearing ₹12 trillion. However, AIFs only represent about 5% of India's GDP, highlighting significant growth potential compared to the US (50%) and UK (10%).

  • AIFs have seen substantial growth in India.
  • They accounted for ₹5 trillion in raised funds as of September.
  • Total investment commitments are nearly ₹12 trillion.
  • Only 5% of India’s GDP is represented by AIFs.
  • This is a stark contrast to 50% in the US and 10% in the UK.
  • Indicates a promising future for AIFs in India.
“AIFs represent just about 5% of India's GDP, underlining immense growth potential.”

The growth of AIFs demonstrates both rising interest and the potential for significant growth in India’s investment landscape.

item.title: '70 missiles, 100 drones': Russia launches 'massive attack' on Ukraine on Christmas - The Times of India
item.description:
Russia Launches Massive Attack on Ukraine

Publication Date: December 25, 2023 Source: The Times

This article reports on Russia's significant military offensive against Ukraine during Christmas, involving a barrage of 70 missiles and 100 drones aimed at critical infrastructure.

  • The attack occurred on December 25, 2023, straining resources in Ukraine.
  • Reported damage includes power outages and destruction of civilian areas.
  • International reactions include condemnation from Western nations.
  • Ukrainian military is ramping up defenses in response.
"This is one of the most significant attacks since the beginning of the conflict," said a military analyst.

The ongoing conflict continues to escalate, raising concerns about humanitarian issues in the region and the potential for wider implications in global politics.

item.title: Jasprit Bumrah proving bigger threat than Hadlee, Ambrose, Holding, Kapil in Australia - The Times of India
item.description:
Jasprit Bumrah Proving Bigger Threat Than Hadlee, Ambrose, Holding, Kapil in Australia

Date & Source: Not provided

Jasprit Bumrah has emerged as a formidable threat during India’s cricket tours in Australia, surpassing legendary bowlers and contributing significantly to India's success.

  • Bumrah has taken 21 wickets in three Tests of the ongoing Border Gavaskar Trophy at an average of 10.90.
  • He crossed 50 Test wickets in Australia, with a strike rate of 41.0, the best among his peers.
  • Historic series wins by India align with Bumrah's impressive performance during these tours.
  • He has taken two five-wicket hauls this tour, showcasing exceptional skill.
  • Bumrah's performance outshines cricket legends like Richard Hadlee and Curtly Ambrose, with statistics proving his dominance.
“Virat Kohli is a modern-day great. He will figure it out.” - Rohit Sharma

In conclusion, Jasprit Bumrah's outstanding bowling against Australia has not only redefined standards but also potentially set new benchmarks in Test cricket.

item.title: Justin Baldoni's career is ‘dead’ as Blake Lively's filing is ‘just the start’ of legal war: Report - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Blake Lively Accuses Justin Baldoni of Sexual Harassment: A Legal Battle Begins

Publication Date: December 25, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Blake Lively has filed a civil rights complaint against her co-star Justin Baldoni, accusing him of sexual harassment during the filming of 'It Ends With Us'. The legal actions mark the beginning of a significant legal feud, impacting Baldoni's career as allegations of a smear campaign arise.

  • Blake Lively files a complaint alleging sexual harassment against Justin Baldoni.
  • The complaint includes accusations of a retaliatory smear campaign orchestrated by Baldoni's PR firm.
  • Baldoni's career has taken a hit; he has lost representation from talent agency WME.
  • Legal expert predicts Lively could potentially win millions from the lawsuit.
  • The situation draws parallels to the Johnny Depp-Amber Heard legal battles.
  • Baldoni’s reputation is severely impacted, with increasing support for Lively from the film industry.
“It's absolutely reputation-related. She has, between her and her husband, all the money in the world.” - Attorney Camron Dowlatshahi

This case highlights serious allegations in the entertainment industry, with significant reputational implications and a potential long-lasting impact on Baldoni's career.

item.title: Mamata Machinery IPO share price: Strong listing ahead? Check latest GMP - India Today
item.description:
Mamata Machinery IPO Share Price: Strong Listing Ahead? Check Latest GMP

Published On: Dec 25, 2024

Source: India Today

The Mamata Machinery IPO has garnered massive interest from investors with a subscription rate close to 200 times. The IPO shares are set to debut on the Bombay Stock Exchange on December 27, 2024, following a favorable Grey Market Premium (GMP).

  • The IPO saw a subscription rate of 194.95 times by the end of the final bidding day.
  • Retail investors subscribed 138.08 times, while the QIB segment was subscribed 235.88 times.
  • The NII category registered the highest interest with 274.38 times subscription.
  • The GMP currently stands at Rs 260, suggesting a potential listing price of Rs 503 and a gain of 107% per share.
“Investors who receive allotments will see the company’s shares debut on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) and National Stock Exchange (NSE) on Friday, December 27, 2024.”

This IPO has shown overwhelming interest, indicating strong market confidence ahead of its listing.

item.title: NASA Parker Solar Probe Makes Closest-Ever Approach to the Sun, Becomes Fastest Object Built by Humans - Gadgets 360
item.description:
NASA’s Parker Solar Probe Makes Its Closest-Ever Flyby of the Sun

Publication Date: December 25, 2023 Source: Gadgets 360

The Parker Solar Probe has completed its closest-ever flyby of the Sun, reaching a distance of approximately 6.1 million kilometers, gathering crucial data about the solar environment.

  • First man-made object to approach this close to the Sun.
  • During the flyby, it achieved a speed of 692,000 km/h, breaking its previous speed record.
  • Communication with the probe was temporarily lost, with reconnection expected by December 27.
  • This was the 22nd flyby of the Sun, with four more planned for 2025.
  • The probe helps scientists understand solar phenomena like coronal mass ejections and their impact on Earth.
“The corona reaches temperatures exceeding 1.1 million degrees Celsius at a certain distance from the Sun.”

This milestone enhances NASA's ability to study solar activity and its implications for Earth, offering insights into solar storms that can affect technology and infrastructure.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 20: Only 2% Drop On 3rd Tuesday, Allu Arjun Now Eyeing The 800 Crore Club! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 20: Only 2% Drop On 3rd Tuesday, Allu Arjun Now Eyeing The 800 Crore Club!

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Koimoi

Sukumar’s directorial Pushpa 2 is bringing cheer this Christmas season, with Allu Arjun's film continuing to perform well at the box office. The official figures for the third Tuesday collections have been released.

Maintains an outstanding hold!

The film earned 11.50 crores yesterday, showing minimal drop from 11.75 crores on day 19, with the total collection in the Hindi belt now at 715.75 crores.

Day-wise Box Office Breakdown:

  • Week 1: 433.50 crores (8-day extended week)
  • Week 2: 199 crores
  • Day 16: 12.50 crores
  • Day 17: 20.50 crores
  • Day 18: 27 crores
  • Day 19: 11.75 crores
  • Day 20: 11.50 crores

Total: 715.75 crores

Will it unlock the 800 crore milestone?

The film faces competition with the release of Baby John, which could affect its performance, but it is on track to potentially be the first Hindi film to reach the 800 crore mark.

Note: Box office numbers are based on estimates and have not been independently verified.

Kejriwal Responds to Controversy Over AAP's Welfare Schemes

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Times of India

An overview of the ongoing controversy regarding AAP's welfare schemes and the response from Delhi Chief Minister Kejriwal.

  • Kejriwal addresses criticism aimed at the AAP's welfare initiatives.
  • The response highlights the importance of welfare schemes in addressing citizens' needs.

“Our schemes are designed to help the poorest sections of society,” Kejriwal stated.

The article emphasizes the significance of welfare schemes in politics, showcasing the ongoing battle between political parties in Delhi.

item.title: KKR and Bain each bid more than $5 bln for Seven | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
KKR and Bain Submit Bids Over $5 Billion for Seven & i Assets

Date: December 25, 2023 Source: Reuters

Private equity firms KKR and Bain Capital have each made bids exceeding $5 billion for non-core assets of Japan's Seven & i Holdings. The bidding marks a significant move in the retail landscape as Seven & i seeks to divest from various subsidiaries.

  • KKR's bid is approximately 800 billion yen ($5.1 billion) for York Holdings.
  • Bain Capital's offer stands around 1.2 trillion yen.
  • Japan Industrial Partners has also placed a bid of around 750 billion yen.
  • The bids surpass the expected enterprise value of 500 billion yen set by Seven & i.
  • Seven & i aims to finalize the winning bid by February 2024, with significant implications for the company's future.
“The largest privatisation of a Japanese firm, if realised, would mark a historic development in the market,” according to sources.

This bidding round indicates the companies' strategic focus on streamlining operations and responding to competitive pressures in the retail sector.

item.title: Rupee's Real Effective Exchange Rate climbs to 108.14 in Nov: RBI report - Business Standard
item.description:
Rupee's Real Effective Exchange Rate climbs to 108.14 in Nov: RBI report

Publication Date: November, 2023

Source: Reserve Bank of India

The Real Effective Exchange Rate (REER) of the rupee appreciated to 108.14 in November, showcasing resilience amidst global market pressures. This report provides insight into the currency's performance in relation to trade competitiveness.

  • REER increased from 107.20 in October to 108.14, marking a 0.9% appreciation.
  • Nominal appreciation is attributed to factors overcoming adverse price differences.
  • Emerging market currencies faced pressure while the rupee showed the lowest volatility among major currencies.
  • REER changes affect trade balance differently; depreciation tends to improve short-term trade, while appreciation has long-term benefits.
  • Several factors influence REER, including productivity, terms of trade, and government spending.
“Our empirical findings on India suggest an asymmetrical impact of REER movements on India’s trade balance,” the report noted.

Overall, while the rupee continues to appreciate, its complex interaction with global and domestic factors makes monitoring its impact on trade crucial for future economic strategies.

item.title: Delhi CM Atishi could be arrested soon, probe agencies may conduct raids on AAP leaders: Arvind Kejriwal's big claim - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Arvind Kejriwal Claims Imminent Arrest of Delhi CM Atishi Amid Election Tensions

Publication Date: Wednesday
Source: Hindustan Times

Amidst escalating tensions ahead of the assembly elections, Arvind Kejriwal accused central agencies of plotting to arrest Delhi Chief Minister Atishi under false charges.

  • Kejriwal claims central agencies have been instructed to fabricate charges against Atishi.
  • He alleges raids are also planned on senior AAP leaders.
  • The AAP is pushing for two new schemes targeting women and elderly citizens.
  • Kejriwal criticizes BJP's governance in Delhi over the last 10 years.
  • Concerns raised about fraudulent activities related to AAP's new schemes.
“Even if they arrest me, I have faith in the legal system and the Constitution. Despite their false accusations, I am confident I will secure bail.” - Atishi

The confrontation highlights ongoing political tensions as the AAP prepares for the upcoming elections.

item.title: Student sexually assaulted by 2 inside Chennai's Anna University campus - Deccan Herald
item.description:
Student sexually assaulted by 2 inside Chennai's Anna University campus

Published Date: 25 December 2024, Source: Chennai News

A 19-year-old engineering student was sexually assaulted by two unidentified men at Anna University in Chennai on the evening of December 23. The incident has raised serious concerns about safety on campus.

  • The incident occurred near the Highway Laboratory at approximately 7:45 PM.
  • Two men attacked the victim's male friend before dragging the female student into bushes.
  • The student reported the incident to both the police and the university's Protection of Sexual Harassment committee.
  • Authorities have initiated a criminal case, including charges of rape and sexual harassment.
  • Police are reviewing CCTV footage and have detained a suspect.
  • The incident has prompted criticism from political leaders regarding law and order in the state.
“Such incidents could have been prevented if the government had taken my criticism in the right stride,” - Edappadi K Palaniswami
“Women don’t feel safe in the State anymore.” - K Annamalai

This shocking incident highlights ongoing safety concerns for students in higher education institutions.

item.title: Cummins wants Konstas to play like 'you're a kid in the backyard' on Boxing Day debut - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
Cummins Encourages Konstas to Enjoy His Boxing Day Test Debut

Publication Date: December 25, 2023 | Source: ESPN Cricinfo

Australia captain Pat Cummins has urged Sam Konstas to embrace the youthful spirit during his Test debut against India, scheduled for Boxing Day at the MCG, in front of an expected crowd of over 90,000.

Cummins shared insights from his own debut experience, encouraging Konstas to play freely and enjoy the moment.

  • Cummins recalls his debut at 18, feeling less pressure due to his youth.
  • He emphasizes the importance of naivety and playing like a kid in the backyard.
  • Konstas will make his debut as Australia’s second youngest men's Test player.
  • Travis Head is fit to play after a successful fitness test.
  • Scott Boland returns to the squad in place of the injured Josh Hazlewood.
“The message to Sam... just enjoy the moment.” - Pat Cummins

With strong support from friends and family, Konstas is set to make a memorable debut, looking to follow in Cummins' footsteps.

item.title: Rohit Sharma to open, KL Rahul at No.3 in place of Shubman Gill; Washington Sundar to return in India's XI: Reports - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Rohit Sharma to Open, KL Rahul at No.3 in India's Boxing Day Test

Date: Dec 25, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

India is making significant changes to their batting lineup for the Boxing Day Test against Australia, with Rohit Sharma returning to the opening position alongside Yashasvi Jaiswal and KL Rahul moving to No.3.

  • Rohit Sharma will open alongside Yashasvi Jaiswal.
  • KL Rahul replaces Shubman Gill at No.3.
  • Sundar may return to the squad, possibly replacing Nitish Reddy or Akash Deep.
  • Rohit has struggled in the middle order in recent games, prompting the switch.
  • The series is currently tied at 1-1, making this Test crucial for the ICC World Test Championship.
“Let’s not worry about who bats where. Something that we need to figure and not something I would be discussing here. We will do what is best for the team,” Rohit Sharma commented.

The changes in the batting order highlight India's strategy to enhance performance as they seek an advantageous position in the Test series.

item.title: 100 million users for Zupee and 100 million reasons to get onboard with skill-based gaming - India TV News
item.description:
Zupee Reaches 100 Million Users: A Milestone in Skill-Based Gaming

Publication Date: Not Specified Source: India TV News

Zupee continues to lead the evolution of casual gaming with the announcement of reaching 100 million users. This achievement emphasizes its commitment to safe and skill-based gaming.

  • Zupee has reached a milestone of 100 million users participating in skill-based games.
  • The platform ensures responsible gaming practices with spending limits and time restrictions.
  • It offers a variety of online cash games, including Ludo and Trump Cards.
  • Zupee aims to empower gamers by enhancing their skills and strategic thinking.
  • Support and counselling services are available to promote responsible gaming behavior.
"Zupee's commitment to fair play and responsible gaming is crucial for a sustainable gaming environment." - Zupee spokesperson

This milestone showcases Zupee's significant role in the Indian casual gaming market, promoting skill enhancement and responsible gaming.
